commitResults.messageTitle: Implement while-loop to echo user's input
Add task list feature
commitResults.messageBody: Refactored command execution process into instance methods, and initialized a chatbot instance inside the main function. Also, refactored long line into a separate constant and made use of StringBuilder instead of string concatenation where possible.

commitResults.messageTitle: Create Task class and add mask/unmask commands
Update executeCommand to use switch statement instead of if-else
Add Todo, Deadline, and Event classes
commitResults.messageBody: Also added *.class to .gitignore to prevent .class files from being committed

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement todo, deadline, and event commands
commitResults.messageBody: Removed NEW_LINE from LONG_LINE_WITH_NEW_LINE since all the lines will have a new line in the current implementation. Also, added a missing space for deadlines and events in the toString() method.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update test files
commitResults.messageBody: Also fixed number agreement in response text when adding tasks to the list

Add toString method for DukeException

Fix checks for datetime field in event/deadline commands
Add delete functionality
commitResults.messageBody: Also added initial capacity for task list of 100, as mentioned in Level-2

commitResults.messageTitle: Add enum for task types
commitResults.messageBody: Also removed unnecessary getTaskIcon method since it should return it's corresponding task icon

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor add task logic
commitResults.messageBody: Moved the add task logic and response message to a separate method. Also added JavaDoc for the executeCommand and addTask methods

commitResults.messageTitle: Enforce code style
commitResults.messageBody: Mainly added javadoc for classes and class methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement save/load tasks feature from local file
commitResults.messageBody: Fixed a bug where adding a task was printing the remove task message inside Duke.java. Also moved the multi-line operations to new lines to adhere to the code standards

commitResults.messageTitle: Convert String datetime fields to LocalDateTime
commitResults.messageBody: Also updated datetime variable names for Deadline and Event to be more semantic, i.e. deadline and timing

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug with storing datetime in storage file
Create Ui, Parser, and TaskList classes and update Storage functionality
Refactor classes to separate packages
Fix Gradle configuration for mainClassName
Add tests for mark, todo, unmark commands and tasklist
Add value to task type enum and refactored exceptions into separate files

Standardise comments to use American spelling and add missing period to comments
Add find command and fix input validation for commands
commitResults.messageBody: Fixed input strings for description and datetime fields when splitting by checking with .trim().isEmpty(). Also refactored the printing of a list of tasks into a Ui method

commitResults.messageTitle: Add missing javadocs
Add checkstyle and fix coding style violations
Add GUI and rename to Dukegg
Update javadoc for isExit method and refactor app shutdown method to Dukegg
Rename package to dukegg
Add assertions
commitResults.messageBody:
To verify the correctness of an invariant in the code, we need to use assertions.

Consequently, we are adding assertion statements.

Added assertion statements to:
- getResponse method as the input can never be null
- createFileAndSubdirectoriesIfFileNotFound as the file must have been created after calling this method

This is to ensure during runtime that the methods listed behave as expected.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor invalid task exception
commitResults.messageBody:
The error message was being defined twice for invalid index access in both MarkCommand and UnmarkCommand

To address this, I created a new exception class to handle the error message to be generated. I also found out that the DeleteCommand was missing the index out of bounds check, so it was also added to the DeleteCommand

A new exception class was created to standardise the error message and formatting to minimise the amount of refactoring required when changing the error message content or format.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix GitHub workflow .yml file
Add tag to tasks and update storage methods
commitResults.messageBody:
Add tag field to Task class and added new constructors to Task and its subclasses to make the creation of these tasks more flexible.

Storage will use constructors that require a tag to be passed as tags will always be stored in the storage file. If it is empty, it will be stored as null.

The commands will use contructors that do not require a tag as they will not be able to assign a tag to a new task.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add tag/untag commands
commitResults.messageBody:
Implement the tagging and untagging features for the branch requirement.

Also added the necessary Ui methods and used a monospace font for the dialog text box.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add missing javadoc to new methods and remove unused imports
